testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Test data file is set as "NonPega_TestData.json"......................passed Given Open the browser and navigate to the "NonPega" url....................passed When I login to NonPegaApp with "nonpegauser" and "nonpegapassword".........passed And I search for "productname" in the product list page.....................passed Then I verify "productprice" in the productpage.............................passed When I add the product to cart..............................................passed And I open the cart.........................................................passed And I remove the product from cart..........................................passed Then I verify the cart is empty.............................................passed When I Logout from NonPegaApp...............................................passed Then Logout should be successful from NonPegaApp............................passed
